Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.recipe.output

Class RecipeOutput<T>

java.lang.Object
design.aeonic.nifty.api.recipe.output.RecipeOutput<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluidOutput, ItemOutput
public abstract class RecipeOutput<T> extends Object
Describes an output of any type for a ModularRecipe, with a given chance..
